title: nODe gOpi gokuladoLu
sahitya:
nODe gOpi gOkuladoLu hari mADuva lIlegaLapratiyamma 


caraNam 1    rangananetti sambhramadindali angaNadoLage nindADisalu 
tingaLa bimbava kaNDAkSaNa tannagaiyoLage nilisi koDemba
    caraNam 2    cinnanu nODali endakkaradali kannaDiyanu tandu kaiyali koDalu 
tanna mukhada pratibimbava kaNDu adannu karedu baLiyirisiriyemba
    caraNam 3    ariyade dIpava kempage kaNDu seraginalli koDu Aduvenemba 
karuvinante tannanu koNDoidu turugaLa moleyanu uNisiriyemba
    caraNam 4    paripariyindali koDEya mEle parediha citrada gombeya nODi 
karava piDidu eLetandu tannaya nereyalliye nIvirisiriyemba
    caraNam 5    taruNi ninnaya sukrtada balavu haruSavemage abhivrddhiyAgihudu 
purandara viTTalana cariyava nODalu dhareyoLagina bAlakarantallave
